removalSettings.title: Survey Reminder Removal
removalSettings.description: If you remove this schedule, you will no longer have a permanent link to the survey.

notifications.title: Survey Link Notification
notifications.description: Your Qualtrics survey link reminder is here!
notifications.content:
If you ever forget the link to the weekly assessments, or no longer have it saved in the main schedule, you can use the following link to return:

<#80ff80>Survey Link

Your ID number is:

<>
